name: @dr.pogodin/sample-player
description: A flexible web audio buffer player

scripts.build: npm run coverage && npm run api && npm run discify && npm run dist
scripts.dist: mkdir -p dist && browserify lib/index.js | uglifyjs > dist/sample-player.min.js && ls -hall dist/
scripts.discify: browserify --full-paths lib/index.js | uglifyjs | discify > tmp/disc.html && open tmp/disc.html

author: Dr. Sergey Pogodin <doc@pogodin.studio>
